channel.title: Drowning508 Problem
channel.description:
I get this error when a player is killed in Drowning508:
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.dropStuff(Player.java:3701) at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.process(Player.java:2317) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:258) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)
I don't understand what the problem is. And compiling gave no errors too. Could someone help me please?

item.title: Drowning508 Problem
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

I get this error when a player is killed in Drowning508:

Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.NullPointerException
at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.dropStuff(Player.java:3701)
at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.process(Player.java:2317)
at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:258)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)

I don’t understand what the problem is. And compiling gave no errors too.
Could someone help me please?

Read full topic
